mapper.insert: INSERT INTO controller (gsm_key, controller_info_id, controller_type, ip, `port`, controller_status,description,properties,id ) SELECT #{to_gsm_key}, controller_info_id, controller_type, ip, `port`, controller_status,description,properties,(${to_gsm_key} * 1000000000) + (id % 1000000000) FROM controller WHERE gsm_key = #{from_gsm_key}
mapper.select: SELECT id, model, name, homepage, email, phone, last_update, name_i18n FROM cd_controller_info

SELECT controller.*, device.* FROM controller INNER JOIN device ON device.controller_id = controller.id
AND controller.gsm_key = #{gsm_key} AND controller.id = #{id}

SELECT A.id , A.controller_info_id , A.device_type_id , A.device_type_num , A.auto_create , A.default_name , IF(A.default_address1 IS NOT NULL, A.default_address1, B.default_address1) AS default_address1 , IF(A.default_address2 IS NOT NULL, A.default_address2, B.default_address2) AS default_address2 , IF(A.default_address3 IS NOT NULL, A.default_address3, B.default_address3) AS default_address3 , B.device_type , B.device_type_name FROM cd_controller_info_dep_device_type A INNER JOIN cd_device_type B ON A.device_type_id = B.id WHERE A.controller_info_id = #{controller_info_id}

SELECT id, device_type_id, device_type_idx, user_info_id, gsm_key, green_house_id, controller_id, nickname, device_type_nickname, description, setup_date, x_position, y_position, x2_position, y2_position, memo, modbus_address1, modbus_address2, modbus_address3, `mode`, update_date, auto_manual_mode, `status`, device_type, properties FROM device WHERE controller_id = #{controller_id}
